titleInfo.title: Ext 6872/41 ‘Assistance given by British officials to the Chinese Consul-General, Vladistok on his return to China via Persia & India’

physicalDescription.extent: The file consists of a single item.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a translation of a letter supplied by the British Embassy at Chungking [Chongyang], dated 29 May 1941, from the Protocol Bureau of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, which conveyed their gratitude for assistance rendered to Mr Pao Yi while traveling through Iran and India on his return from Vladivostok to China.A list of correspondence references by year can be found on the front cover.
